conversations.body_text: Hi Connor Craven,    We apologize, but your order has already been shipped. We are currently attempting to change the delivery address for you.

Hi

I have still not received my order. Using the tracking number it shows it
has been in transit for over a week now with no new update
Hi that link shows that package as being delivered in Argentina
